divs: Sighting Details i'm an alien, known the best ubder bourne serieses. danballah wedo plus shango plus buddha was the negative results of another alien that used to be on this planet it would hear the offering in spirit and one could create any spirit with letter combinations i experimented with it for a decade ultimately destroying danballah wedo also know as the serpent satan in israeli texts... i would appreciate credits in my experiences of dan's wake (the spirits would officially see their name at least 3 letters in succession and take posession like shawns and dans and julies everywhere) FDC K00401619
